attributes.action: promote the use of non-polluting existing fuels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of knee jerk taxes on the use of fossil fuels,why will the Gov't not promote the use of existing,non-polluting fuels for transport needs.
This is readily available, as in Turkey, etc, where virtually every garage sells it; but here probably only a dozen petrol stations supply it.
Why, with the worry over Global warming, is this not top of the enviroment agenda?
